content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetSiteScripts path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scripts content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all serverless scripts
responses
200
cdngetsitescriptsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
cdnsitescript
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a serverless scripts unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack to which a serverless scripts site belongs
siteid
type str
desc the id of the site to which a serverless script belongs
name
type str
desc a serverless scripts name
version
type str
desc a serverless scripts version number

version numbers start at 1 and are incremented every time the script is updated
code
type str
format byte
desc base64 encoded contents of a serverless script
paths
type str
desc the url paths that incoming requests should answer with a serverless script

every serverless script needs at least one path and paths must be unique
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a serverless script was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a serverless script was last updated
desc a serverless script

serverless scripts are hosted and executed on stackpaths edge nodes
desc the requested serverless scripts
desc the result from a request to retrieve all edgeengine scripts on a cdn site
title: 25_Serverless Scripting_GetSiteScripts_151.json
